content.description: Sit start same as Blade Dancer on the sharp under-cling and make a left hand move to the best hold on the face. Square up and launch up and right to the sharp crimps on the top of the face. Match and top right.
content.location: First block visible from parking. Same rock as Blade Dancer.

content.description: Sit start on the sharp under-cling. Power your way up to the small edges, then make the big move up and left to the top of the block.
content.location: First block visible from the parking. Left side of the steepest overhang.

content.description: Roadside blocks that are visible from the Kroger parking lot on Hwy 41 & Acworth Due West Rd. One block is about 7 foot tall and has 3 maybe 4 lines on it. The other has two lines that are fit for the average cheeser.
